t: Waiting for the Redemption of the Lord
Out*pn of the depths I have cried to You, O Lord;*s
Lord,*ld hear my voice! Let*ld Your ears be attentive To*ld the voice of my supplications.
If*ln You, Lord,*s should mark iniquities, O*ld Lord, who could stand?
But*ld there*i is*i forgiveness with You, That*ld You may be feared.
I*ln wait for the Lord,*s my soul waits, And*ld in His word I do hope.
My*ld soul waits*i for the Lord More*ld than those who watch for the morningâ€” Yes,*ild more*i than*i those who watch for the morning.
O*ln Israel, hope in the Lord;*s For*ld with the Lord*s there*i is*i mercy, And*ld with Him is*i abundant redemption.
And*ld He shall redeem Israel From*ld all his iniquities.
